author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Plaza Retail REIT Announces Bought Deal Public Offering Of $45 Mln Of Convertible Unsecured Subordinated Debentures
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Plaza Retail Reit:
* PLAZA RETAIL REIT ANNOUNCES BOUGHT DEAL PUBLIC OFFERING OF $45 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE UNSECURED SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES
* PLAZA RETAIL REIT-DEAL TO SELL TO UNDERWRITERS, ON A BOUGHT-DEAL BASIS, $45 MILLION 5.10% CONVERTIBLE UNSECURED SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES DUE MARCH 31, 2023​
* PLAZA RETAIL REIT - ‍DEBENTURES ARE CONVERTIBLE AT OPTION OF HOLDER, INTO UNITS OF REIT AT $﻿5.65﻿ PER UNIT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
